Detailed Description

template<class Base, class Extra>
struct TREX::utils::internals::XmlArgHelper< Base, Extra >

Argument type helper for XmlFactory.

Template Parameters:
Base the base type for the node
Extra An extra argument type

This class helps to identify and manipulate the argument type of an XmlFactory class.

XmlFactory class allows user to add an extra argument to be given with the XML node during analysis. This comes handy when one need extra information not directly accessible through the xml node. This class is used by XmlFactory to identify the resulting argument type used to produce a new object and access to the XML node. In particular it take care of the special type where Extra is void reflecting that no extra argument is expected apart the XML node

Note:
this class is an helper used internally by XmlFactory and should not be used directly otherwise.
Author:
Frederic Py <fpy@mbari.org>
